Summary: The Labels field is not being displayed under the Filter name field

Steps to reproduce.2: Click on the gear menu in the right upper corner of the page
Steps to reproduce.4: Tap on the hamburger menu in the left upper corner of the page and choose the Edit option
Steps to reproduce.5: Observe a field under the Filter name field

Expected result: The Labels field should be displayed under the Filter name field
Actual result: The Labels field is not displayed under the Filter name field
